entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
